actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to participation in voluntary prayer or meditation in the public buildings.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that nothing contained in the Constitution shall abridge the right of persons lawfully assembled, in any public buliding which is supported in whole or in part through the expenditure of public funds, to participate in voluntary prayer or meditation.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to participation in voluntary prayer or meditation in the public buildings.
